message.name: ERR_ENT_ACTION_CHILD_LINK_XRV_CHILD_ALREADY_ASSOCIATED
message.locale: This %1s record is already associated with this Action.

message.name: ERR_ENT_ACTION_CHILD_LINK_FV_CHILD_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Action child type must be provided.

message.name: ERR_ENT_ACTION_CHILD_LINK_XRV_ACTION_CANCELLED
message.locale: %1s cannot be associated to Action as Action has been canceled already.
%1s cannot be associated to Action as Action has been cancelled already.
